name: 陳怡靜
objective:
This course is ONLY served to INTERNATIONAL students who are at very beginning level. Exchange students are welcome to take it if it has vacancy. Students are with motivation to study Chinese. The phonic system is HanYu Pinyin, character is taken with traditional Chinese. It would be better that your English ability has been achieved to B1 at least for communicating with your classmates and teacher. You need to cooperate with people who are from multiple culture. 
The course is based on daily life speaking and listening, it will be included Chinese culture, grammar. The Chinese learning strategy has to be taught for helping you to keep learning further. 
Frequently Chinese speaking and reading are necessary in this class.  Writing and listening are the skills which be also enhanced in this class. The assignments will be required.
